## Part 1

### Part 1A: Exponential transformation

```{r}
Exp <- function(x, k) {
    series <- rep(NA,k+1)
    for(i in 0:k) {
      series[i+1] <- (x^i) / factorial(i)
    }
    sum(series)
}
```

### Part 1B: Sample mean and sample standard deviation

```{r}
sample_mean <- function(x) {
    sum(x) / length(x)
}

sample_sd <- function(x) {
    xbar <- sum(x) / length(x)
    sqrt(sum((x - xbar)^2) / (length(x)-1))
}
```
